misc.DotmapUtils module¶

misc.DotmapUtils.get_required_argument(dotmap, key, message, default=None)¶

Returns an argument from a dotmap object, raises and error if it does not exist.

Parameters

  • dotmap (dotmap) –

  • key (str) –

  • message (str) – Error message to be raised.
